verses.text: \w I|strong="G1223"\w* BESEECH \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w mercy|strong="G3628"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w that|strong="G2316"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w present|strong="G3936"\w* \w your|strong="G1223"\w* \w bodies|strong="G4983"\w* \w a|strong="G2316"\w* \w living|strong="G2198"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="G2378"\w*, \w holy|strong="G0040"\w*, \w pleasing|strong="G2101"\w* unto \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w your|strong="G1223"\w* \w reasonable|strong="G3050"\w* \w service|strong="G2999"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w conformed|strong="G4964"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w world|strong="G0165"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* reformed \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* newness \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w mind|strong="G3563"\w*, \w that|strong="G3778"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* prove \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w is|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w acceptable|strong="G2101"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w perfect|strong="G5046"\w* \w will|strong="G2307"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w*, \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w me|strong="G1325"\w*, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w more|strong="G3956"\w* wise \w than|strong="G3844"\w* \w it|strong="G1223"\w* behoveth \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* wise, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* wise unto sobriety, \w and|strong="G2316"\w* \w according|strong="G5613"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath \w divided|strong="G3307"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w one|strong="G1538"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w measure|strong="G3358"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w as|strong="G1722"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w* \w we|strong="G1161"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w members|strong="G3196"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w members|strong="G3196"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w same|strong="G0846"\w* office:

\w So|strong="G3779"\w* \w we|strong="G1161"\w* \w being|strong="G1510"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w*, \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w every|strong="G2596"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w members|strong="G3196"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w of|strong="G1520"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w different|strong="G1313"\w* \w gifts|strong="G5486"\w*, \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w that|strong="G1161"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w us|strong="G1325"\w*, either \w prophecy|strong="G4394"\w*, \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w be|strong="G2192"\w* used \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* rule \w of|strong="G5485"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*;

\w Or|strong="G1535"\w* \w ministry|strong="G1248"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* ministering; \w or|strong="G1535"\w* \w he|strong="G1722"\w* \w that|strong="G1722"\w* teacheth, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w doctrine|strong="G1319"\w*;

\w He|strong="G1722"\w* \w that|strong="G3870"\w* exhorteth, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w exhorting|strong="G3870"\w*; \w he|strong="G1722"\w* \w that|strong="G3870"\w* giveth, \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w simplicity|strong="G0572"\w*; \w he|strong="G1722"\w* \w that|strong="G3870"\w* ruleth, \w with|strong="G1722"\w* carefulness; \w he|strong="G1722"\w* \w that|strong="G3870"\w* sheweth \w mercy|strong="G1653"\w*, \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w cheerfulness|strong="G2432"\w*.

Let \w love|strong="G0026"\w* \w be|strong="G0018"\w* \w without|strong="G0505"\w* dissimulation. Hating that \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G0018"\w* \w evil|strong="G4190"\w*, cleaving \w to|strong="G0018"\w* that \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G0018"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w*.

Loving \w one|strong="G0240"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w* \w with|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* charity \w of|strong="G3588"\w* brotherhood, \w with|strong="G1519"\w* honour preventing \w one|strong="G0240"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w*.

\w In|strong="G2962"\w* carefulness \w not|strong="G3361"\w* slothful. \w In|strong="G2962"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w fervent|strong="G2204"\w*. \w Serving|strong="G1398"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w Rejoicing|strong="G5463"\w* \w in|strong="G5463"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w*. Patient \w in|strong="G5463"\w* \w tribulation|strong="G2347"\w*. Instant \w in|strong="G5463"\w* \w prayer|strong="G4335"\w*.

Communicating \w to|strong="G0040"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* necessities \w of|strong="G0040"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*. \w Pursuing|strong="G1377"\w* \w hospitality|strong="G5381"\w*.

\w Bless|strong="G2127"\w* \w them|strong="G1377"\w* \w that|strong="G3361"\w* \w persecute|strong="G1377"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*: \w bless|strong="G2127"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w curse|strong="G2672"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*.

\w Rejoice|strong="G5463"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w them|strong="G3326"\w* \w that|strong="G3326"\w* \w rejoice|strong="G5463"\w*; \w weep|strong="G2799"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w them|strong="G3326"\w* \w that|strong="G3326"\w* \w weep|strong="G2799"\w*.

\w Being|strong="G1096"\w* \w of|strong="G3588"\w* \w one|strong="G0240"\w* \w mind|strong="G5426"\w* \w one|strong="G0240"\w* towards \w another|strong="G0240"\w*. \w Not|strong="G3361"\w* minding \w high|strong="G5308"\w* \w things|strong="G0846"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* consenting \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w humble|strong="G5011"\w*. \w Be|strong="G1096"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w wise|strong="G5429"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w your|strong="G5426"\w* \w own|strong="G1438"\w* conceits.

\w To|strong="G0444"\w* \w no|strong="G3367"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* rendering \w evil|strong="G2556"\w* \w for|strong="G0473"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w*. Providing \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w*, \w not|strong="G3367"\w* only \w in|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w sight|strong="G1799"\w* \w of|strong="G1799"\w* God, \w but|strong="G0444"\w* also \w in|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w sight|strong="G1799"\w* \w of|strong="G1799"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w it|strong="G1537"\w* \w be|strong="G3956"\w* \w possible|strong="G1415"\w*, \w as|strong="G0444"\w* much \w as|strong="G0444"\w* \w is|strong="G0444"\w* \w in|strong="G3956"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w have|strong="G3956"\w* \w peace|strong="G1514"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*.

\w Revenge|strong="G1556"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G1438"\w*, \w my|strong="G1325"\w* dearly \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w place|strong="G5117"\w* unto \w wrath|strong="G3709"\w*, \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w it|strong="G3004"\w* \w is|strong="G2962"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w*: \w Revenge|strong="G1556"\w* \w is|strong="G2962"\w* \w mine|strong="G1473"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w will|strong="G2962"\w* \w repay|strong="G0467"\w*, saith \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* thy \w enemy|strong="G2190"\w* \w be|strong="G3778"\w* \w hungry|strong="G3983"\w*, \w give|strong="G4160"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* eat; \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w thirst|strong="G1372"\w*, \w give|strong="G4160"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w drink|strong="G4222"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w*, \w doing|strong="G4160"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w*, thou shalt \w heap|strong="G4987"\w* \w coals|strong="G0440"\w* \w of|strong="G1909"\w* \w fire|strong="G4442"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w head|strong="G2776"\w*.

\w Be|strong="G0018"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w overcome|strong="G3528"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w overcome|strong="G3528"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w*.
